name: Digital Arts Project - Heaven Angel Hotel: Celestial Means Sky Bound
name_original: Digital Arts Project - Heaven Angel Hotel: Celestial Means Sky Bound
description:
Heaven Angel Hotel, also found on my page, is an animated music video. This multimodal project follows the story of that animation into three other mediums; written, comic, and game. The link to the animation on Youtube is attached.

Content of these three however, follow a prequel of the animation till the first couple seconds of the animation.

Read, View, and Play each to see how storytelling can change with mediums by following this one story.
